We call ITypeBinding.getJavaElement() which is not speced to throw an IAE.

Looking at the code I don't see how this can happen. Have you seen this IAE
since you entered this bug ?

No. However from the stack trace it looks like it happened in the context of
generics. Since I am not using generics right now it seems obvious that I didn't
get the exception.
Please reopen if you see it again.
